sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When resolving a problem, all related records will be moved to resolved with the relevnt information from the problem</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group display_value="Hikon Professional Services" name="Hikon Professional Services">0ea124de4f6463007e72aa95d310c750</assignment_group> <category display_value="Incident">c99d05924f2863007e72aa95d310c7b0</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>When resolving a problem, all related incident will move to resolve The close code & Close notes will be updated based on the close information from the Problem and in the work-notes it will say: This incident is now resolved by {link to the problem record}</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 01:00:00</estimated_hours> <notes/> <number>TAS0001085</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>Problem - Resolve</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>New</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-20 20:51:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e3b7bd6f4fa423007e72aa95d310c7f4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>rachel.rowlandson@gb3.co.uk</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-24 08:49:05</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
